sentences: Meie tsehhi vananenud värgid vahetati uute seadmete vastu.
Kopsud ja muud värgid on mul terved.
Sahtlis oli igasuguseid riistu ja värke.
context: The Estonian word 'värki' is the partitive form of 'värk', which has multiple meanings depending on context. It can refer to physical devices, equipment, tools (like machinery or instruments), but also more abstract concepts like affairs, matters, activities, or situations. The word is highly versatile and appears in various compound words with different specialized meanings.
